argumentText:
ARGUMENT
r z

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_funeq | |- ( r = R -> ( Fun r <-> Fun R ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( r = R /\ z = Z ) -> ( Fun r <-> Fun R ) ) |
| 3 |  | #P_oveq12 | |- ( ( r = R /\ z = Z ) -> ( r supp z ) = ( R supp Z ) ) |
| 4 | 3 | #P_eleq1d | |- ( ( r = R /\ z = Z ) -> ( ( r supp z ) e. Fin <-> ( R supp Z ) e. Fin ) ) |
| 5 | 2, 4 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( ( r = R /\ z = Z ) -> ( ( Fun r /\ ( r supp z ) e. Fin ) <-> ( Fun R /\ ( R supp Z ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_df-fsupp | |- finSupp = { <. r , z >. | ( Fun r /\ ( r supp z ) e. Fin ) } |
| 7 | 5, 6 | #P_brabga | |- ( ( R e. V /\ Z e. W ) -> ( R finSupp Z <-> ( Fun R /\ ( R supp Z ) e. Fin ) ) ) |
